data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fautin, Daphne Gail, Zelenchuk, Taras, Raveendran, Dinesh (2007): Genera of orders Actiniaria and Corallimorpharia (Cnidaria, Anthozoa, Hexacorallia), and their type species *. Zootaxa 1668: 183-244, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180167
